column2: "Na Paul gyeen n'enyi hwɛɛ baguafo no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Enuanom
column5: tsibowa pa nyina na medze mabɔ me bra ama Nyankopɔn ebesi ndɛ yi."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfopanyin Ananias hyɛɛ hɔn a wogyinaa ne nkyɛn no dɛ wɔmbɔ n'ano."
"Nna Paul see no dɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn bɔbɔ wo
column4: ɔwo fasu a wɔahoa ho: na etse hɔ rubu me atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse
column5: na ibu mbra no do hyɛ dɛ wɔmbɔ me?"

column2: "Na hɔn a wogyinaa hɔ no see no dɛ
column3: Ereyaw Nyankopɔn no sɔfopanyin?"

column2: "Na Paul see dɛ
column3: Enuanom
column4: minnyim dɛ ɔyɛ sɔfopanyin: na wɔakyerɛw dɛ
column5: Mma nnkasa bɔn wɔ wo man mu otsitsir ho."

column2: "Na Paul hun dɛ dɔm no fa yɛ Sadusiifo
column3: na ɔfa yɛ Farisiifo no
column4: ɔtseaa mu wɔ baguamu hɔ dɛ
column7: nye Farisiifo ba: ewufo no hɔn enyidado nye hɔn soɛr ntsi na worubu me atsɛn yi."

column2: "Na ɔkaa dɛm no
column3: akasakasa baa Farisiifo no nye Sadusiifo no ntamu
column4: na nyimpadodow no mu paae."

column2: "Na Sadusiifo no se dɛ owusoɛr anaa ɔbɔfo anaa sunsum biara nnyi beebi: na Farisiifo no dze wɔgye ne nyina to mu."
"Na wɔtseatseaa mu kɛse; na kyerɛwfo a wɔwɔ Farisiifo afamu no bi soɛree na wɔperee kaa dɛ
column3: Yennhu bɔn biara wɔ nyimpa yi mu: na sɛ sunsum anaa ɔbɔfo akasa akyerɛ no a
column4: ebɛn asɛm a?"

column2: "Na akasakasa pii soɛree no
column3: safohen panyin no suroo dɛ wɔbɛtsetsew Paul mu ntsi
column4: ɔhyɛɛ nsordaafo no dɛ wonsian nkohwim no wɔ hɔn nsamu
column5: na wɔmfa no nkɔ aban mu."

column2: "Na anadwe a odzi do no
column3: Ewuradze begyinaa ne nkyɛn
column4: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Hyɛ dzen: na dɛ mbrɛ edzi mo ho dase wɔ Jerusalɛm yi
column6: dɛmara so na ɔsɛ dɛ ikedzi dase wɔ Rome so."

column2: "Na adze kyee no
column3: Jewfo no pamee kekaa ntam dɛ worinndzidzi
column4: eso wɔronnom

column2: "Na hɔn a wodzii bɔtɔboa yi no bɔbor eduanan."
"Na wɔbaa asɔfompanyin nye mpanyimfo no hɔ bɛsee dɛ
column3: Yɛakeka hɛnho ntam dɛ hwee rennka hɛn ano gyedɛ yeeku Paul ansaana."

column2: "Na afei hom nye baguafo no nkɛka nkyerɛ safohen panyin no dɛ ɔmfa no nsian mbra hom hɔ
column3: dɛ gyama hom ribebisa no ho asɛm yie: na hɛn dze
column4: ɔrotwe bɛn no

column2: "Na Paul no wɔfase tsee hɔn pɔw no
column3: ɔkɔree kɛhɛɛn aban no mu kɛkaa kyerɛɛ Paul."

column2: "Na Paul frɛɛ ɔhamupanyin kor baa ne nkyɛn
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Fa aberantsɛ yi kɛma safohen panyin no
column5: na ɔwɔ asɛm bi ka kyerɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔfaa no dze no kɔr safohen panyin no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Paul daduanyi no frɛɛ me baa ne nkyɛn
column5: na ɔserɛɛ me dɛ memfa aberantsɛ yi mbrɛ wo
column6: na ɔwɔ asɛm bi ka kyerɛ wo."

column2: "Na safohen panyin no suoo ne nsamu nye no kɔr nkyɛn beebi
column3: na obisaa no dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na ewɔ ka kyerɛ me?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Jewfo no apam dɛ wɔbɛserɛ wo dɛ ɔkyena fa Paul sian bra bagua mu
column4: ma aayɛ dɛ woribebisa no ho asɛm yie."

column2: "Na mma nntsie hɔn: na hɔn mu bɔbor eduanan retsɛw no a wɔakeka hɔnho ntam dɛ worinndzidzi
column3: eso wɔronnom gyedɛ woeku no ansaana; na sesei yi woesiesie hɔnho rotweɔn wo hɔ anohoba."

column2: "Na safohen panyin no maa aberantsɛ no kɔree
column3: na ɔbraa no dɛ
column4: Mma nnka nnkyerɛ obiara dɛ aka asɛm yi akyerɛ me."

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ ɔhamumpanyin no beenu baa ne nkyɛn see dɛ
column3: Hom nsiesie nsordaafo ahaenu
column4: nye mpɔnkɔdofo eduosuon
column6: ma wɔnkɔ Kaesarea anadwe ndɔnkron no mu;"

column2: "na wɔnhwehwɛ mbowa so
column3: na wɔmma Paul ntsena do
column4: na wɔmfa no nkɔ dwudwoodwo nkɛma ambrado Feliks."

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛɛw nwoma a ɔtse dɛm yi:"
"Klaudius Lisias kyia ambrado Feliks."
"Ɔbarimba yi
column3: Jewfo no kɛfaa no dɛ nkyɛ woruboku no
column4: na menye nsordaafo kɔr hɔn do kɛgyee no

column2: "Na merepɛ mehu sombo a wɔdze bɔɔ no no
column3: medze no baa hɔn bagua mu;"

column2: "na muhun dɛ hɔn mbra ho nsɛmbisa ntsi na wɔnye no wɔ nkuro
column3: na wɔammfa biribi a ɔsɛ wu anaaso nkyehoma annto no do."

column2: "Na wobetsiaa me nan dɛ wɔretsɛw ɔbarimba no
column3: ntsɛmara na mosomaa no wɔ wo nkyɛn
column4: na mahyɛ n'atoafo no so dɛ wɔmbɛka dza wɔwɔ wɔ no ho wɔ w'enyim."

column2: "Na nsordaafo no faa Paul dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛɛ hɔn no ara
column3: na wɔdze no kɔr Antipatris anadwe no."

column2: "Na adze kyee no
column3: wɔmaa mpɔnkɔdofo no dze no kɔree
column4: na wɔsanee baa aban mu;"

column2: "na hɔn dze wokodur Kaesarea
column3: na woyii nwoma no maa ambrado no
column4: wɔdze Paul so kegyinaa n'enyim."

column2: "Na ɔkenkaan nwoma no wiei no
column3: obisaa ɔmansin kor a ofi mu; na ɔtsee dɛ ofi Silisia no
column7: nna mibetsie wo. Na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa no nsie Herod aban mu."
